name: Super Meme Quest
description:
Super Meme Quest

A world of meme characters has been taken over. Norman, an unknown stick figure, sets off on an adventure to save the land and free the memes. Some of the memes got corrupted, so you first have to fight them.

There are 4 types of levels

  • Platformer
  • Top-down shooter
  • Rhythm platformer
  • Bullet hell
